original_title: Words & Music: John Mellencamp's Greatest Hits
overview: This is the Bonus DVD that shipped with JOnh Mellencaps albulm Words & Music. John Mellencamp is the all-American small-town boy grown-up and his music reflects his life spent in the heartland: roots-rock, country and folk with garage rock sensibilities. His lyrics are frequently liberal and democratic and touch on issues such as racism, patriotism and the needs of farmers and small-town folk.
title: Words & Music: John Mellencamp's Greatest Hits
